Package com.niton.themes

Class FlatDarkTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.niton.themes.base.Theme
      • com.niton.themes.base.ResizeableTheme
        • com.niton.themes.FlatDarkTheme
  • public class FlatDarkTheme
extends ResizeableTheme
    This is the FlatDarkTheme Class. A simple theme with borders good useable for all OS
    Version:
    2018-08-09
    Author:
    Nils Brugger
